name: Plastic Battlegrounds
summary:
Welcome to Plastic Battlegrounds

Plastic Battlegrounds is the newly commissioned sandbox toy-based battle simulator where your plastic soldiers engage in intense set piece battles of your imagination.

{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}

Set up the battlefield with an ever growing list of units, vehicles, emplacements, and environment hazards then either join the battle as a plastic soldier or be life sized and tower over the chaos. Drive toy jeeps, crush enemies driving a tank, or pilot drones...
